text: Addin Tyldesley (21 December 1878 - 9 May 1962), a member of Tyldesley Swimming and Water Polo Club, was a British swimmer. He competed in the men's 100 metre freestyle event at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1878 births Category:1962 deaths Category:British male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Great Britain Category:Swimmers at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:People from Tyldesley Category:Male freestyle swimmers
title: Addin Tyldesley
